label: 和歌
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: A synonym for tanka, a form of courtly poetry consisting of thirty-one syllables arranged in five lines of 5-7-5-7-7 syllables each; used to signify courtly as opposed to popular poems, and to refer to poetry written in Japanese rather than in Chinese. [短歌]
